data.marketing-features-customers-mws-text: With andCards Suite we don't have any conflicting bookings anymore, because its booking system integrates external and internal orders. The booking system allows us to manage meeting rooms cost-efficiently. Also, I find andCards IoT integrations very promising for building a fully automated and unmanned coworking space.
data.marketing-features-customers-nipa-text: For our K-Startup Grand Challenge program we needed an efficient room booking system that allowed all teams to make bookings wherever they are, and enforce credit-based booking to regulate how many times each member can book a room. andCards Suite excels at both tasks.
